webscript.shortname: Authorisation status check for a new publishing channel
webscript.description:
Used to check whether a specified publishing channel has been authorised by the target service provider. The returned "authStatus" value is one of:
  • PENDING - we haven't finished the necessary exchanges with the service provider yet.
  • REJECTED - our request to authorise the channel has been rejected. The channel creation has failed.
  • AUTHORISED - the channel has been authorised and is now ready to be used.

arg.description: The protocol of the store in which the relevant publishing channel lives.
